title: Best noise cancelling headphones I've ever owned
text: I've been using these headphones for 6 months now and they're absolutely incredible. The noise cancelling is phenomenal - I can barely hear anything when it's on, even on a busy subway. The sound quality is excellent for music, podcasts, and calls. Battery life easily lasts me a full week of daily use. They're comfortable enough to wear for hours without any discomfort. The touch controls take a little getting used to but work well once you learn them. My only minor complaint is that they're a bit bulky for travel, but the included case helps. Highly recommend!
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2025

title: Great headphones but pricey
text: These are definitely high-quality headphones. The noise cancellation works really well and the sound is clear. I use them daily for work calls and music. The battery lasts forever which is great. However, I do think they're overpriced for what you get. There are cheaper alternatives that do almost as good of a job. The app is useful for customization but feels a bit clunky. Overall satisfied with the purchase but wished I had waited for a sale.
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2025

title: Perfect for working from home
text: I bought these specifically for video calls while working from home and they've exceeded my expectations. The microphone quality is excellent and people can hear me clearly. The noise cancelling blocks out background noise from my family which is essential. They're comfortable enough to wear all day during back-to-back meetings. The multipoint connectivity is great for switching between my laptop and phone. Definitely worth the investment for remote work.
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2025

title: Good but not perfect
text: These headphones have great noise cancellation and sound quality, but I've had some issues. The Bluetooth connection occasionally drops, especially when moving between rooms. The touch controls are finicky and sometimes don't register properly. They're also quite tight on my head even after weeks of use. On the positive side, the battery life is amazing and the sound is excellent. I'm keeping them but I'm not as impressed as I expected to be given the high price and reviews.
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2025

title: Excellent for travel
text: I fly frequently for work and these are a game changer. The noise cancelling completely eliminates engine noise on planes. I can finally sleep comfortably on long flights. The battery lasts for multiple trips without needing to recharge. The folding design and case make them easy to pack. Sound quality for movies and music during flights is superb. They're also great for drowning out noise in busy airports. Best travel purchase I've made.
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2025
